mapper.select: SELECT cor.`id`,`corname`,`corleading`,cor.`createtime`,cor.`corscale`,`descs`, f1.`filepath` bannerfile, f2.`filepath` videofile FROM `corporation` cor LEFT JOIN filetable f1 ON f1.`id` = cor.`bannerid` LEFT JOIN filetable f2 ON f2.`id` = cor.`videofile` WHERE cor.`iscor` = 1

SELECT cor.`id`,`corname`,`corleading`,`cortercher`,`corworkspace`,cor.`createtime`,`descs`, sd1.`value` corforcollege, sd2.`value` corcollege, sd3.`value` corfaculty, f1.`filepath` filefile, f2.`filepath` bannerfile, f3.`filepath` videofile FROM `corporation` cor LEFT JOIN `sys_dict` sd1 ON sd1.`id` = cor.`corforcollege` LEFT JOIN `sys_dict` sd2 ON sd2.`id` = cor.`corcollege` LEFT JOIN `sys_dict` sd3 ON sd3.`id` = cor.`corfaculty` LEFT JOIN `filetable` f1 ON f1.`id` = cor.`fileid` LEFT JOIN filetable f2 ON f2.`id` = cor.`bannerid` LEFT JOIN filetable f3 ON f3.`id` = cor.`videofile` WHERE cor.`id`=#{corid} AND cor.`iscor` = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE corporation set iscor = 0 WHERE id = #{corid}

UPDATE corporation
corname = #{corname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corleading = #{corleading,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cortercher = #{cortercher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corworkspace = #{corworkspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corcollege = #{corcollege,jdbcType=INTEGER},
corfaculty = #{corfaculty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
corcollege = #{corcollege,jdbcType=INTEGER},
corscale = #{corscale,jdbcType=INTEGER},
descs = #{descs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE id = #{corid}
